Class GUIRoot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is24am05.client.view.View
it.polimi.is24am05.client.view.gui.GUIRoot
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class GUIRoot extends View
Extends the main class View and manages the needed controllers
